title: Soil: more than dirt
brief_description: This program lokks at land degredation due to salting, soil erosion and soil structure decline because of over use of the land itself, this in turn leads to low agricultural productivity. The research done by the department of Conservation, Forests and Land suggests ways and means of better land management practices. No other credits
